issue.title: www.tokyomotion.net

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [NSFW] [https://www.tokyomotion.net](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.tokyomotion.net) ### Comment > Adguard無法防止在進入此網站後有兩次的點擊會觸發網站額外新增一個視窗並重新導向的操作 ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/knh0t5p0vrkc48skk4w4sg4044k40gc10yzd15pwif.jpg?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.1.81 MV3 System version: | Windows 10 Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

Language-specific:
AdGuard Chinese Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled

comment.body: Thanks. I forgot to check the performance. I'll add the rules.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.autoweek.nl/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.autoweek.nl%2F) ### Comment > Adblock detection (blue notice) . Could you remove it? Thank you Username: `@Glassertje` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ehcgrvjjwk088cogsg40gkc8kosgkokecrginxgjag.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.9 System version: | Android 15 Browser: | Firefox Mobiel License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Self-destructing first-party cookies (4320)

**Miscellaneous**:
Hide your Referrer from third-parties,
Hide your User-Agent,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns9.quad9.net:443/dns-query`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt` Filters: | Ad blocking:

AdGuard Mobile Ads
